extra.enrollment_requirement: Prereq: Level 4 & reg in SOCY MAJ or MED & (a min grade of C in SOCY210, SOCY211, SOCY226 & SOCY227) & (a min GPA of 2.60 in SOCY210, SOCY211, SOCY226, SOCY227 & (a min GPA of 2.60 in all units in SOCY).

basic.description: The major aim of this course is to explore notions of 'difference' through various theoretical perspectives. Specific topics include sex, gender, sexuality, sexual reproduction, intersex and transex.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Sociology of Sex Diversity
